reviewText: Oh my Goodness!  These Creation DVD series DVDs are wonderful!  You have got to get them!  I think there are 4 volumes!
use this video for long plane ride around the world, our little girl loves them

From both  scientific and Biblical perspectives, Dr. Martin's entire series is the GOLD STANDARD! If you're looking for accuracy congruent with Biblical truth, look no further, the BEST is right here!!! Get an extra set to have for when you wear out your first set!!!
Bought specifically for it's pro creation vs evolution view point. Very saitisfied with this whole series. Hope they'll make more. My son loves them.
